mapper.select: SELECT a.* ,b.`username` AS userName,c.`bookname`,c.`image_url` FROM `book_user_comment` a LEFT JOIN `writer_user` b ON a.`writer_id` = b.id LEFT JOIN `book` c ON a.`book_id`= c.`id` WHERE a.is_hide = 0 AND a.is_auth=1 AND a.is_long=1 ORDER BY a.gmt_create DESC limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from ( SELECT a.* ,b.`username` AS userName,c.`bookname`,c.`image_url` FROM `book_user_comment` a LEFT JOIN `writer_user` b ON a.`writer_id` = b.id LEFT JOIN `book` c ON a.`book_id`= c.`id` WHERE a.is_hide = 0 AND a.is_auth=1 AND a.is_long=1 )t

SELECT a.*,b.content,b.score,b.`gmt_create` AS createTime,c.`username` AS userName FROM `book` a LEFT JOIN `book_user_comment` b ON a.`id`= b.book_id LEFT JOIN `writer_user` c ON b.`writer_id` = c.id WHERE b.id=#{id}
